availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Boyd County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Hannah Bowling. Married to Lucrecia Polina Crow in Boyd County, Kentucky on October 6 1860. Father of John W. Bowling and Endora Bowling. Farmer in Carter County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Boyd County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, District 2, p. 223B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boyd County, p. 710.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Illinois, Gallatin County, Township 8, Range 8, p. 354B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Boyd County Marriages, Film #000344011, p. 227.
